mapper.select: SELECT MEETING_ID AS meetingId , MEETING_TITLE AS meetingTitle , MEETING_DATE AS meetingDate , MEETING_PLACE AS meetingPlace , MEETING_PRICE AS meetingPrice , MEETING_LIMIT AS meetingLimit , MOIM.MOIM_ID AS moimId FROM MEETINGS JOIN MOIM ON MEETINGS.MOIM_ID = MOIM.MOIM_ID WHERE MEETINGS.MOIM_ID = #{id}
